other_title: Sushi e Além: Uma Família Britânica Saboreando o Japão (Portuguese)
英国一家、日本を食べる (Japanese)
plot: Inspired by a book of Japanese cuisine, British travel and dining journalist Michael Booth took his family -- his wife Lissen, their boys Ansger and Emil -- to Japan for 100 days, in order to enjoy as many types of Japanese foods as possible.
